summary: This document contains an email exchange regarding a meeting agenda and scheduling involving Caroline V. Kitidis and Paul Morris. It highlights internal communications at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. about a meeting related to client partnerships and investment coverage.

persons.name: Caroline V. Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline V. Kitidis is involved in scheduling and organizing meetings related to client partnerships and investment coverage at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is coordinating with Caroline Kitidis regarding a meeting and sending a briefing related to the agenda.

connections.description: Caroline Kitidis and Paul Morris are colleagues at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. discussing meeting logistics.

events.title: 3E Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled for October 22, 2013, regarding client partnerships and investment coverage.

keyFacts: The email exchange is dated October 21, 2013.
Caroline V. Kitidis is the Managing Director and Head of Key Client Partners & Wealth Investment Coverage - Americas at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
Paul Morris is coordinating a meeting and briefing related to the agenda.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
